rules: Rule1: If the mobile app sends a notification, then if the temperature sensor triggers an alert, smart monitoring is not active

Rule2: If automated response is initiated, then if alert system notifying the user does not lead to temperature sensor triggering an alert resulting in smart monitoring not being active, then manual intervention is not required
Rule3: If emergency protocol is activated, then automated response is initiated
Rule4: If battery backup is adequate, then if emergency cooling is engaged, the refrigeration system is not operational
Rule5: Either battery backup is adequate or solar power is available
Rule6: If solar power is available, then if emergency cooling is engaged, the refrigeration system is not operational
Rule7: If local server remains operational, then cloud backup is accessible
Rule8: If offline mode becomes active, then if internet connection becomes unstable, the food item becomes contaminated
Rule9: If power outage occurs, then if internet connection becomes unstable, the food item becomes contaminated
Rule10: If primary router is functioning, then local server remains operational
Rule11: Either primary router is functioning or mesh network becomes active
Rule12: If mesh network becomes active, then peer-to-peer communication is established
Rule13: If peer-to-peer communication is established, then offline mode becomes active
Rule14: If admin authorization is granted, then if power outage not occurring does not lead to manual override being possible, system override is executed
Rule15: Either admin authorization is granted or emergency authorization becomes active
Rule16: If emergency authorization becomes active, then if power outage not occurring does not lead to manual override being possible, system override is executed
Rule17: If backup generator becomes active, then the refrigeration system is not operational
Rule18: Either temperature sensor triggers an alert or humidity sensor triggers an alert
Rule19: If humidity sensor triggers an alert, then smart monitoring is not active
Rule20: Either alert system notifies the user or mobile app sends a notification
Rule21: If alert system notifying the user does not lead to temperature sensor triggering an alert resulting in smart monitoring not being active, then manual intervention is required
Rule22: If power outage not occurring does not lead to backup generator becoming active, then food safety breach occurs
Rule23: If power outage does not occur, then emergency cooling is engaged
Rule24: If power outage does not occur, then refrigeration system remains operational
Rule25: If power outage does not occur, then manual override is not possible
Rule26: If internet connection becomes unstable, then smart monitoring remains active
facts: Fact2: The food item does not become contaminated
Fact3: Cloud backup is not accessible
Fact4: System override is not executed
Fact5: Food safety breach does not occur
